title: Chaos rune

properties.value: Chaos runes are used for low level missile spells, such as wind bolt, water bolt, earth bolt and fire bolt. They are also used to charge the trident of the seas.

Chaos rune

Item ID562

Chaos runes are used for low level missile spells, such as wind bolt, water bolt, earth bolt and fire bolt. They are also used to charge the trident of the seas.

They spawn in the Wilderness near some moss giants, in the north-west corner of the Dark Warriors' Fortress, and can also be bought from the Varrock and Port Sarim magic shops.

Members can make them with the Runecraft skill at level 35 at the Chaos Altar, by having pure essence in the inventory and a chaos tiara equipped or a chaos talisman in the inventory, granting 8.5 experience per rune crafted. At runecraft level 74 and up, two chaos runes are made per essence at the Chaos Altar.

{{External|rs|rsc}} {{HasMMG|Collecting chaos runes}} {{Infobox Item |name = Chaos rune |image = [[File:Chaos rune.png]] |release = [[24 May]] [[2001]] |update = New magic system online! |members = No |quest = No |tradeable = Yes |placeholder = Yes |equipable = No |stackable = Yes |noteable = No |destroy = Drop |examine = Used for low level missile spells. |respawn = 200 |value = 90 |weight = 0.000 |exchange = Yes |id = 562 }} [[File:Chaos rune detail.png|left|120px]] '''Chaos runes''' are used for low level missile [[spells]], such as [[wind bolt]], [[water bolt]], [[earth bolt]] and [[fire bolt]]. They are also used to charge the [[trident of the seas]]. They spawn in the [[Wilderness]] near some [[moss giant]]s, in the north-west corner of the [[Dark Warriors' Fortress]], and can also be bought from the [[Varrock]] and [[Port Sarim]] [[magic shop]]s. Members can make them with the [[Runecraft]] skill at level 35 at the [[Chaos Altar]], by having [[pure essence]] in the inventory and a [[chaos tiara]] equipped or a [[chaos talisman]] in the inventory, granting 8.5 experience per rune crafted. At runecraft level 74 and up, two chaos runes are made per essence at the Chaos Altar. ==Runecraft info== {{Tabber |tab1 = Pure essence |tab1content = {{Recipe |skill1 = Runecraft |skill1lvl = 35 |skill1boostable = yes |skill1exp = 8.5 |members = yes |ticks = 1 |facilities = Chaos Altar |tools = Chaos tiara, Chaos talisman |notes = [[Multiple runes|2 runes]] per essence after level 74. |mat1 = Pure essence |output1 = Chaos rune }} |tab2=Daeyalt essence |tab2content={{Recipe |skill1 = Runecraft |skill1lvl = 35 |skill1boostable = yes |skill1exp = 12.75 |members = yes |ticks = 1 |facilities = Chaos Altar |tools = Chaos tiara, Chaos talisman |notes = [[Multiple runes|2 runes]] per essence after level 74. |mat1 = Daeyalt essence |mat1cost = no |output1 = Chaos rune }} |tab3=Guardian essence |tab3content={{Recipe |skill1 = Runecraft |skill1lvl = 35 |skill1boostable = yes |skill1exp = 9.5 |members = yes |ticks = 1 |facilities = Chaos Altar |notes = [[Multiple runes|2 runes]] per essence after level 74. |mat1 = Guardian essence |mat1itemnote = Accessible only in the [[Guardians of the Rift]] minigame. |mat1cost = no |output1 = Chaos rune }} |tab4 = Chaos core |tab4content = {{Recipe |skill1 = Runecraft |skill1lvl = 35 |skill1boostable = yes |skill1exp = 85 |members = yes |ticks = 1 |facilities = Chaos Altar |tools = Chaos tiara, Chaos talisman |notes = [[Multiple runes|20 runes]] per core after level 74. |mat1 = Chaos core |mat1cost = no |output1 = Chaos rune |output1quantity = 10 }} }} {{Chaos Rune Spells}} ==Products== {{Uses material list|Chaos rune}} ==Item sources== {{Drop sources|Chaos rune}} ===Store locations=== {{Store locations list|Chaos rune}} ===Item spawns=== {{ItemSpawnTableHead}} {{ItemSpawnLine|name=Chaos rune|location=[[Wilderness]] -
